data.comment: Rio Ave kick-off the first half - the match is underway!
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a Rio Ave throw-in in Gil Vicente's half.
In the minute 2, Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Gil Vicente in their own half.
Gil Vicente to take a throw-in in Rio Ave territory.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 4, Ball safe as Gil Vicente is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Gil Vicente in the half of Rio Ave.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Lourency for Gil Vicente who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 8, Lourency returns to the field for Gil Vicente after picking up a slight injury.
Can Rio Ave get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gil Vicente's half?
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a Rio Ave throw-in in Gil Vicente's half.
In the minute 9, Luis Miguel Branco Godinho awards Rio Ave a goal kick.
Free kick for Rio Ave in their own half.
Throw-in for Rio Ave at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos.
In the minute 13, Free kick for Gil Vicente in the half of Rio Ave.
Lucas Mineiro (Gil Vicente) strikes at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos but his header is cleared.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 15, Can Rio Ave get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gil Vicente's half?
Rio Ave awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Barcelos a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 17, Rio Ave awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Filipe Augusto has the misfortune to make it 1-0 through an own goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Barcelos.
In the minute 22, Attention is being given to Gil Vicenteâ€™s Lucas Mineiro and play has been suspended briefly.
Rio Ave awarded a free kick in their own half.
Gil Vicente's Lucas Mineiro is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 24, Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Gil Vicente in their own half.
Free kick Gil Vicente.
Rio Ave to take a throw-in in Gil Vicente territory.
In the minute 29, Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Rio Ave.
Corner awarded to Rio Ave.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 30, Throw-in for Rio Ave in the half of Gil Vicente.
Gil Vicente have been awarded a corner by Luis Miguel Branco Godinho.
Throw-in Rio Ave.
In the minute 33, Gil Vicente will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Rio Ave.
Joao Afonso is booked for the home team.
Rio Ave drive upfield and Filipe Augusto gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Gil Vicente defender.
In the minute 35, Ball goes out of play for a Gil Vicente goal kick.
Throw-in for Rio Ave in their own half.
Corner awarded to Rio Ave.
In the minute 37, Rio Ave have been awarded a corner by Luis Miguel Branco Godinho.
Ball safe as Rio Ave is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Gil Vicente in the half of Rio Ave.
In the minute 41, Gil Vicente to take a throw-in in Rio Ave territory.
Rio Ave awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Gil Vicente at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos.
In the minute 45, Rio Ave's Gelson Dala gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Gil Vicente defender.
Free kick in a good position for Rio Ave!
At Estadio Cidade de Barcelos the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half is underway. Gil Vicente with the kick-off.
In the minute 46, Luis Miguel Branco Godinho awards the home team a throw-in.
Bruno Moreira is replacing Lucas Piazon for the away team.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Rio Ave.
In the minute 49, In Barcelos a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Rio Ave drive into the zone and Carlos Mane is presented with a brilliant opportunity. But his strike hits the upright!
Gil Vicente have a goal kick.
In the minute 51, Free kick for Rio Ave in their own half.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Rio Ave.
Goal kick for Gil Vicente at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos.
In the minute 55, Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Gil Vicente in their own half.
Gil Vicente are caught offside.
Corner awarded to Rio Ave.
In the minute 57, Gil Vicente awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Rio Ave in the half of Gil Vicente.
The home team replace Renan Oliveira with Antoine Leautey.
In the minute 60, Lourency of Gil Vicente gets in a strike, but is off target.
Rio Ave have a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Barcelos.
In the minute 62, Gil Vicente have been awarded a corner by Luis Miguel Branco Godinho.
Free kick Gil Vicente.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a Gil Vicente throw-in in Rio Ave's half.
In the minute 63, Free kick Gil Vicente.
Free kick for Rio Ave in their own half.
Rio Ave have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 66, Free kick for Gil Vicente in their own half.
Aderllan Santos (Rio Ave) gets a yellow card.
Can Rio Ave get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gil Vicente's half?
In the minute 68, Goal kick for Rio Ave at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos.
In Barcelos a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Rio Ave in their own half.
In the minute 71, Gama is making the team's second substitution at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos with Chico Geraldes replacing Diego Lopes.
Rio Ave make their third substitution with Ryotaro Meshino replacing Pele.
Nikola Jambor is on a sub for Costinha for Rio Ave.
In the minute 72, Free kick for Rio Ave in the half of Gil Vicente.
Filipe Augusto of Rio Ave smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Rio Ave have been awarded a corner by Luis Miguel Branco Godinho.
In the minute 73, Can Rio Ave get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gil Vicente's half?
Rio Ave's Gelson Dala breaks free at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Gil Vicente goal kick.
In the minute 76, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in high up the field for Gil Vicente in Barcelos.
Corner awarded to Rio Ave.
In the minute 79, Rio Ave have been awarded a corner by Luis Miguel Branco Godinho.
Rio Ave to take a throw-in in Gil Vicente territory.
Rio Ave are pushing forward but Ryotaro Meshino's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 81, Ball goes out of play for a Gil Vicente goal kick.
Nikola Jambor for Rio Ave drives towards goal at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a Gil Vicente throw-in in Rio Ave's half.
In the minute 83, Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Rio Ave.
Throw-in for Rio Ave in the half of Gil Vicente.
Gelson Dala for Rio Ave gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 85, Luis Miguel Branco Godinho awards Gil Vicente a goal kick.
Vitor Carvalho is replacing Claude Goncalves for the home team.
Miullen is on a sub for Samuel Dias Lino for Gil Vicente.
In the minute 87, Corner awarded to Rio Ave.
Rio Ave's Pedro Amaral is on target but unsuccessful.
In Barcelos Rio Ave attack through Carlos Mane. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 88, It's a goal kick for the home team in Barcelos.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Barcelos to check on Ruben Fernandes, who is grimacing with pain.
Ruben Fernandes for Gil Vicente is back on the field again.
Rio Ave awarded a free kick in their own half.
Gil Vicente have a goal kick.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Gil Vicente in the half of Rio Ave.
Gil Vicente to take a throw-in in Rio Ave territory.
Goal kick for Rio Ave at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos.
Rio Ave's Filipe Augusto gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Gil Vicente goal kick.
Rio Ave awarded a free kick in their own half.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Gil Vicente in their own half.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-0.
Gil Vicente make their fourth substitution with Henrique Gomes replacing Lucas Mineiro.
Goal! Lourency extends Gil Vicente's lead to 2-0.
